By incorporating metal ions into cholesterol-based structures, scientists can tune the spin preference of electrons, paving the way for more efficient and sustainable electronics.

Virat Kohli's 93 anchored the chase, with crucial late contributions from Harshit Rana and KL Rahul sealing the win.

The ED claims its officers were threatened and evidence was seized.

Your heart doesn’t care how young you are: Myths busted by cardiologists
description: Heart disease is a silent killer, affecting younger individuals due to modern lifestyles and prevalent myths. Cardiologists urge people to disregard misconceptions like 'too young' or 'no chest pain' as warning signs are often subtle. Ignoring these can lead to delayed treatment and dire consequences, emphasizing the critical need for early detection and proactive health management.

title: Malayalam Language Bill 2025: What happens when language laws enter schools
description: The Malayalam Language Bill 2025 has triggered an inter-state dispute not over identity, but over schooling. By making Malayalam compulsory as a first language in Classes 1–10, the law raises questions about how safeguards for linguistic minorities will work in border districts like Kasaragod. The debate turns on a familiar fault line: Where language promotion ends, and classroom compulsion begins.

title: Buying a home or renovating? Why Biophilic design works best for urban apartments
description: Biophilic design is transforming urban apartments, bringing nature indoors to combat city stress and enhance well-being. This nature-inspired approach, integrating elements like vertical gardens and natural textures, is becoming a smart, science-based trend for apartment dwellers seeking peace and a healthier living environment.

title: Sam Kerr & Kristie Mewis net worth: Football earnings, deals and life together
description: Sam Kerr and Kristie Mewis are one of football’s most loved couples. Their combined net worth is around $10–$12 million. They met through football, went public in 2021, got engaged in 2023, and married in December 2025. In 2025, they welcomed their son, Jagger. Today, they balance football and family life.

title: Meet the Chef from Bihar who is turning 'poor man’s food’ into power dishes
description: Chef Gautam Kumar, once feeling like a misfit from rural Bihar, defied expectations to become a celebrated chef. He transformed his perceived disadvantages into strengths, championing ancient Indian culinary wisdom, particularly Ayurveda, in elite kitchens.

title: 'You can't align what you can't control': Microsoft AI boss warns rivals
description: Microsoft AI CEO Mustafa Suleyman urges the industry to prioritize containment over alignment in AI development, warning against pursuing superintelligence without first ensuring control. He advocates for a "Humanist Superintelligence" approach, focusing on practical applications like medical AI and clean energy, to maintain human oversight and avoid uncontrolled autonomous systems.

title: Connor McDavid’s wife Lauren Kyle confirms delay in Sports Club Atelier collection
description: Lauren Kyle, founder of Sports Club Atelier and wife of Connor McDavid, shared an update on her upcoming collaboration with Hockey Canada, confirming a slight delay in the launch. She emphasized the importance of getting every detail right. The collection follows the success of her earlier releases, which blend hockey culture with luxury streetwear.

title: Vanessa Bryant thanks fans for braving rain at emotional Mamba book signing
description: Vanessa Bryant recently hosted a 'Mamba & Mambacita Forever' book signing, drawing large crowds despite rain. The event celebrated Kobe and Gianna Bryant's enduring legacy through art and community. Fans shared personal stories, highlighting how Vanessa's foundation continues to inspire and provide sports opportunities for underserved youth, honoring her family's memory.

title: Ayesha Curry promotes Jamaican tourism after devastating hurricane
description: Ayesha Curry is urging fans to support Jamaica's recovery from Hurricane Melissa by visiting the island. She highlighted that tourism is crucial for the Jamaican economy, with nearly 30% of the workforce dependent on it. Curry emphasized that a vacation serves as a donation, with airports and most hotels now operational.
